# lexia 269 gives a very odd instruction. if a previous event happened ( fought a certain amount of bad guys, multiply that number by 6 and go to that page.After going through all possible fights with the exact type of bad guy, the only viable page apperas to be 42[6x7] if event did not happen got to page 383.)
#you must solve the code, given on multiple pages, in order to get to page 13. 13 then tells you to go back to the page that sent you. After checking for every possible instance of attempts to solve the code, there are 16 pages that lead to 13, and 13 leads back to them all.)
#there appears to be a print error for lexia 3, whcih dies not seem to have a page that leads there.
